card.name: Anikthea, Hand of Erebos
card.text: Menace Other enchantment creatures you control have menace. Whenever Anikthea enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 3/3 black Zombie creature in addition to its other types.
